project_preview_description.text: Arjé Coffee pays Colombian coffee growers the fair price.

project_description.text: Arjé Coffee started as a winner idea in Angel Hack 2019 (Taza). The team was initially formed by María Angélica Moya, María Camila Remolina Gutierrez, David Delgado and myself. After two months, we launched our MVP and now we have worked with more than 10 coffee growers. Arjé Coffee was built with ReactJS, NodeJS and we have several integrations with API to make it work.

siteMetadata.title: Juan Murillo
siteMetadata.description: Colombian Software Engineer passionate about web development and coffee.
siteMetadata.author: Juan Murillo | juanmurillo.co
